name: vernisai-monorepo
description: VernisAI - AI-Powered No-Code Workflow Automation. Visit https://vernis.ai for more information.
author: Monsoft Solutions, LLC (https://monsoftsolutions.com)

scripts.validate: npm run format && turbo run validate && npm run format:check
scripts.pre-commit: npm run format && lint-staged && npm run format:check
scripts.db:sync: env-cmd -f .env/.env bash -c 'cd packages/database && npm run db:sync'
scripts.db:generate: env-cmd -f .env/.env bash -c 'cd packages/database && npm run db:generate'
scripts.db:push: env-cmd -f .env/.env bash -c 'cd packages/database && npm run db:push'
scripts.db:studio: env-cmd -f .env/.env bash -c 'cd packages/database && npm run db:studio'
